item.title: Test Cricket: Kane Williamson Steps Down as New Zealand Test Skipper, Southee Named as Replacement
item.description: Test Cricket: Kane Williamson Steps Down as New Zealand Test Skipper, Southee Named as Replacement Kane Williamson Steps Down as New Zealand Test Skipper, Southee Named as Replacement: Kane Williamson, who led New Zealand to the World Test Championship triumph in its inaugural edition, stepped down as captain from the longest format, the countryâ€™s cricket board announced on Thursday.

item.title: Second ODI: Indian batting needs fresh approach to save series against New Zealand
item.description: Second ODI: Indian batting needs fresh approach to save series against New Zealand Hamilton: India would expect a better approach from skipper Shikhar Dhawan and young Shubman Gill in the Powerplay overs when the team clashes with New Zealand in the do-or-die second One-Day International here Sunday.

item.title: Brisbane Cricket Ground weather forecast November 1: Weather report in Gabba Brisbane tomorrow matches
item.description: Brisbane Cricket Ground weather forecast November 1: Weather report in Gabba Brisbane tomorrow matches Brisbane might become another venue to witness a rain-affected match in the ongoing eighth edition of ICC T20 World Cup.
